website_summaries.verdict: Another professional-grade pick, this standing dryer offers its users ultimate comfort and portability.
pros: Height is adjustable from 33-51", making it desirable for owners with dogs of various sizes
Stand rests on four wheels for simple portability
cons: Customers wish the wheels were better constructed
The air force is greater than some buyers expected

customer_reviews.title: Review on the flying pig dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is an awful dryer! I don’t usually do reviews. Weather you are using the hose or the arm for this dryer, it does not lock securely it’s constantly disconnecting from the dryer base. It’s not easily adjustable when lowering the dryer arm. You have to constantly tighten the bolts are otherwise the dryer arm does not stay in place. Would not recommend this product. Bill be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Faulty stand, good dryer.
customer_reviews.text: The dryer is great! However the stand I received is a load of _____. It doesn’t stick when tightened, the dryer falls forward despite being tightened everyday. Stand was probably faultly but if you want a good little dryer, it’s good!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE IS AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: 2/27/20 - new stand came as promised. The new tightening knob is much better and holding the height adjustment so far so good : ) CUSTOMER SERVICE IS AMAZING!!! Update 2/12/20 - a new stand on its way. I will review after new stand arrives and repost. Hoping for a 5 star review. Thank you Stand does not hold dryer up. Hasn’t since purchase date. Worse now. Screw that Tightens stand totally stripped. Spoke to manufacturer in December 2019 and supposedly they were shipping replacement. Called again today. Not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: ac4dogs

customer_reviews.title: I am so very glad I bought this for my grooming shop
customer_reviews.text: I am so very glad I bought this for my grooming shop. I have a lot of sensitive dogs that come in my shop and are afraid of dryer noise. This dryer works excellent and is quiet and makes for a great introduction to drying new pups and shy sensitive adult dogs. Love, Love Love it....
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy duty grooming
customer_reviews.text: I use this because my heavy duty Edemco have finally gave up after many years. This dryer is quiet, yet powerful. Love the hose attachment. The swivel stand needs work. The screws that holds it up constantly need to be tightened, otherwise it will keep falling down, ie: the nozzle points downwards. The "C" clips that keeps the hose and nozzle attachment in place are not quite tight enough. The concentrated nozzle on the hose attachment keeps getting blown off whenever the c-clips are gently knocked out of place. Overall, may be good for home grooming. Definitely not heavy duty enough for professional groomers.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Kar Wong

customer_reviews.title: Stand is horrible to adjust
customer_reviews.text: The dryer is fine. Has two heat settings, great control over the force of the dryer, etc. But the stand is horrible, which is the entire reason I got this dryer. It constantly sinks down when I adjust it. I spend half the time fighting with the height knob instead of drying my dog. Even when the knob is as tight as I can get it, it will still suddenly drop on me. Buy another stand dryer. I wish I had been able to return it, but I was very sick and wasn't able to disassemble it and ship it back before the window closed.
customer_reviews.author: kristine lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great for home grooming
customer_reviews.text: Works great- I can fully blow dry my show cocker spaniel in 30 min head to toe, and blows her out straight with no frizz. I love the adjustable force and heat options. I use it for home grooming. If you are looking for something for a grooming salon I would keep looking though, would need much more force to get through other breeds
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Blower
customer_reviews.text: I had an Oster and didn't like it. It wasn't a variable speed blower and was very loud. The Flying Pig has variable speeds, fairly quiet, works great and the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Howard J. Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Nice dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer! High powered. My only issue is that there isn’t really anywhere to safely hang the attachments when you are finished. I often drop the hose and it falls apart. Eventually I’m sure I will completely break it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so freaking awesome. It has 3 heat settings, and a dial to adjust from low blow to extreme blow. The plastic collars that lock everything into place are flimsy and seem like they could break very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tdbpayne

customer_reviews.title: Stand adjustability
customer_reviews.text: Because of the stand having a bad tightening device I had my husband drill holes every three inches and secure with a long bolt. Now the stand works amazing and is adjustable. Very easy fix!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real quality love it
customer_reviews.text: My teen cousin put this together for me it was a snap. Real quality product. I have 3 ShihTzu’s and tired of paying almost $200.00 every 3 weeks for grooming.
customer_reviews.author: Reba Haggard Brown

customer_reviews.title: was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job drying my big goldendoodle, lovr it
customer_reviews.author: Jewell Galligani

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money
customer_reviews.text: OK dryer for the price but a few things are really annoying. The stand is cheap, luckily I saved a better stand from my former dryer and use it. The nozzle arm is defective and won't stay on the dryer. I have done several things to try to fix but none of them work.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pet spa
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for pet spa at my apartment community and the residents love it
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ford

customer_reviews.title: Its great!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this dryer a long time ago. Its great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stand dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I used this dryer to groom my cocker spaniel. It worked well. I like the different speed and heat options. It seems very well made and should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Book

customer_reviews.title: good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: overall it is a great value. My only complaint is that the dryer tends to slip on the stand that holds it. Its not a huge probably, but just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: agility4

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this mobile dryer
customer_reviews.text: Size is compact, doesn’t take much room and I love the roller stand..works great!! Has two heat settings an eternity knob. Easy assembly for stand
customer_reviews.author: PamperedPaws

customer_reviews.title: great dryer
customer_reviews.text: I had this dryer at my grooming shop, and since I retired from grooming, I purchased one for home. I just love it, and how easy it is to use either on stand, or off. It is easy to take apart for travelling to use at dog shows. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Driskill

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer for an awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been grooming for over 20 years and I love this dryer. Very quiet and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Gsd1234

customer_reviews.title: Better the I thought it would be. 5stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembled. Great volume of air and enough heat to dry pet quickly. Flying pig is not as loud as I thought it would be. Small adjustments made to help make it efficient for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: pam sine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad dryer but don't expect​ a lot of speed
customer_reviews.author: TammyV

customer_reviews.title: Ease of assembling / drying power
customer_reviews.text: This was not easy to put together - and what I don't like about it is the force of the dryer moves the nozzle - it doesn't stay where it is pointed. They need to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Rohrer

customer_reviews.title: Best forced air dryer around!
customer_reviews.text: I not only love the dryer but I love the service from this seller!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little Dyer.
customer_reviews.text: Meeting our needs for a 2 groomer Salon. Will order another one to take on the road to the dog shows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I show Standard Poodles and it is wonderful for fluff drying too
customer_reviews.author: Nikki t.

customer_reviews.title: It's little but it's loud!
customer_reviews.text: been using this for a while now on multiple long coated breeds. Pros: Hi Velocity cuts drying time in half. Cons: This sucker is LOUD. And it blows with such force that hold on to the little ones or they'll blow right off the table! Overall I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: puppyluv

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer and great price point
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this dryer. I love that the hose is detachable it’s like having two dryers for one price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal for a Nice Dryer
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 pet salons. We ordered one of these dryers. We were so happy with it we ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: Riverside G.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little more powerful, but is quiet. Does a great job. I’m happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sherry weaver

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer
customer_reviews.text: Good quality dryer for the money. Plenty of heat for stretch drying.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Happy that I can now dry my dogs in a fraction of the time then I could with my hand held dryer
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great air control.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this dryer -- EXCELLENT. Lots of air and drys as pointed.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Wink

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am a groomer and I love this dryer. Makes my life a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Had one for many years sadly it cannot be repaired. I ordered this one which is as close as I can get to my old one. I groom my own 12 cockers so this is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Martin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent little dryer for the price. It is louder than I thought it would be however
customer_reviews.author: Becky Broussard

customer_reviews.title: What a find for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I only have this week... I am a little clumsy with that yet as I have not owned a standup dryer for many many years. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Arendt

product_meta.title: Flying Pig High Velocity Dog Pet Stand Grooming Dryer w/Variable Air Speed & Heat
product_meta.description: Color:Flying One PurpleDesigned for the sole purpose of drying your pets, the Single-Motor Grooming is perfect for handling any wet-case job. The dryer is equipped within 360 Degree Rotating nozzles tiltable head flexible and strong and durable 120 inch hose that pulls wind from a soft engine resting at the heart of the driver and is easy to pull around or stretch, meeting whatever the user's needs. The steel frame of the dryer also protects it from damage, encasing the motor inside and providing a solid, easy-to-clean casing and filter. The tip of the tube allows for different nozzles to be fitted on and each nozzle is a sleekly designed head made especially for the user's hands. This dryer also features a "control panel" with buttons and toggles that allow the user to adjust the speed and temperature settings. The "control panel" is perfect for anyone who wants to customize their drying experience.
feature_bullets: Constructed with steel shell and the motor is design for hard use for years
Variable Air Speeds & Heats, Stand adjusts from 33 inch to 51 inch and rolls on four lockable casters
Powerful motor up to 4.0 Peak H.P. / 16.36 amps / Voltage 110V / 60 Cycle
Air Volume: 240 CFM / Air Speed: 28000 FPM / Watts: 1800 / Volts: 110V
Equipped 360 Degree Rotating nozzles tiltable head & 120 inch flexible Hose/two different nozzles & filter/1 Year Warranty
